scripts.start: rm -r dist & mkdir dist & cp ./src/qr-scanner-worker.min.js ./dist/ & cp ./src/qr-scanner-worker.min.js.map ./dist/ & parcel ./index.html
scripts.build: rm -r dist & mkdir dist & cp ./src/qr-scanner-worker.min.js ./dist/ & cp ./src/qr-scanner-worker.min.js.map ./dist/ & parcel build ./index.html & firebase deploy
